Chapter 2477: Chapter 2476-sword formation blocking the way

Translator: 549690339

This burly man’s entire body was pitch-black, as if it was cast from black iron, and was filled with endless power.

This burly man wasn’t a human. His true form was a divine beast, a giant ape with infinite strength and strong defense.

Moreover, he was a two star great emperor.

Bang! Bang!

He was cautious as he walked forward step by step. Finally, he stepped into the area of the great array.

Buzzzzzz! Buzzzzzz!

The runes seemed to shake and light up. Countless thin threads stabbed at the man like tiny swords.

“Blockit!”

The burly man roared as World Energy filled his body. At the same time, he took out a few defensive Emperor weapons and charged forward.

However, the power of those tiny sword Qi was too strong. In the blink of an eye, at least tens of thousands of tiny sword Qi had hit him.

The Emperor-level weapons around him were covered in cracks in an instant before exploding and turning into dust.

Ding! Ding! Ding! Ding! Ding!

As soon as the Emperor weapon was broken, countless tiny sword Qi hit the burly man. His body trembled violently, and he was stopped in his tracks.

One side of his body was covered in a layer of frost, while the other side was extremely red.

The burly man’s expression was extremely unsightly. His body trembled and he suddenly spat out a large mouthful of blood. His aura rapidly weakened.

“Not good!”

Heavenly venerate six sages’s expression changed. He rushed over and pulled the burly man out.

Everyone saw that the burly man’s body was covered with tiny holes, from which cold and hot air flowed out.

The burly man quickly sat down cross-legged, swallowed a pill, and began to heal his injuries.

He had been severely injured just now. If not for the help of the six sages, he would have definitely died here.

The others looked solemn.

The power of this Grand array was also too powerful.

Even a two-star heavenly Emperor couldn’t resist it, so it would probably be the same for a three-star heavenly Emperor.

“I’ll try!”

A three-star heavenly Emperor was unwilling to give up and wanted to try.

Unfortunately, he couldn’t do it either. His defense was quickly broken by the tiny sword Qi, and he spat out a large mouthful of blood.

He was in a slightly better state than the burly man from before. He had taken the initiative to retreat, but he had also suffered considerable injuries.

Even a three-star heavenly Emperor couldn’t do it, so everyone turned to look at the six sages.

His cultivation was the highest among the people present, so they could only rely on him now.

“I’ll do it!”

Heavenly venerate six sages strode forward and stepped into the array.

As soon as he stepped into the formation, a Pagoda appeared in his hand and enveloped him within it. Then, he took a big step forward, wanting to rush over. That Pagoda was a heaven Dao soldier!

However, the runes in the surroundings shone even brighter as boundless sword Qi rushed towards six sages.

In particular, the sword Qi in front of him increased by several times, forming a wall of sword Qi in front of him.

Ding! Ding! Ding!

The sword Qi attacked the heaven Dao soldier in a frenzy, causing it to shake violently.

Bang! Bang!

Celestial venerable six saints unleashed his full power and a powerful aura emanated from him. Controlling the heaven Dao soldier, he strode forward with all his might.

However, every step was extremely difficult.

After a few minutes, heavenly venerate six sages had only advanced less than ten meters.

One had to know that this section with the formation was a few hundred meters long.

The sounds of the collision grew more and more intense, and the heaven Dao soldiers also began to shake more and more violently.

Sparks flew in all directions, and an ear-piercing sound came from the heaven Dao soldier.

Heavenly venerate six sages’s expression changed drastically.

Even the heaven Dao soldiers were damaged and couldn’t block it.

Heavenly venerate six saints hurriedly retreated, not daring to advance.

Retreating was much easier than advancing. Not long after, heavenly venerate six sages had already retreated out of the array.

He hurriedly checked the heaven Dao soldier and found that there were a few small holes on it.

Heaven Dao soldiers were too hard to come by. Now that they were damaged, it would be extremely troublesome to repair them.

“It seems that we can’t go over!”

it’s difficult to pass this formation without the cultivation of a six-star heavenly Emperor or above!

The others sighed.

However, at this moment, a figure stepped out.

“Lu Ming!”

The others were shocked.

Lu Ming actually wanted to give it a try. If even heavenly venerate six sages could not do it, how could Lu Ming?

Bang! Bang!

Lu Ming’s speed was extremely fast as he stepped into the array.

Lu Ming did not use the heaven Dao soldier.

The six sages had already proven that the heaven Dao soldiers were useless.

Using them would only damage them.

Lu Ming wanted to try it with his own strength.

Whoosh! Whoosh! Whoosh!

As soon as Lu Ming entered the formation, countless tiny sword auras rushed toward him.

Some of the sword Qi was extremely cold, while the others were extremely hot.

Lu Ming felt that he was in a furnace where coldness and heat converged. Buzzzzzz!

The muscles all over Lu Ming’s body trembled rapidly. At the same time, he activated the imperishable golden body to block the sword Qi.

Ding! Ding! Ding!

When the sword Qi stabbed Lu Ming’s body, there was a piercing sound of metal clashing. Many of the sword Qi were blocked.

However, Lu Ming felt a sharp pain in his body as if he was being pricked by needles.

Although most of the sword aura was blocked, a portion of it broke through Lu Ming’s defense and pierced into his body.

Lu Ming quickly activated the indestructible ancient scroll and recovered quickly.

Fortunately, Lu Ming’s physical body was extremely strong and his life force was exuberant. With the help of the indestructible ancient scroll, his injuries recovered very quickly.

Bang! Bang!

Lu Ming took a few steps forward. However, the further he went, the more sword aura he encountered.

More sword Qi pierced into Lu Ming’s body. His recovery speed could not keep up with the speed of his injuries.

“My Lord!”

Lu Ming growled. His entire body was covered in a purple-gold light. The power of domination covered his entire body.

A series of concentrated sounds rang out, and the ruler’s power trembled, but it wasn’t pierced. The sword Qi was blocked.

“The power of a ruler is indeed effective!”

Lu Ming was overjoyed.

Then, he continued to stride forward. In less than a minute, Lu Ming had advanced more than 50 meters, far surpassing the previous six sages.

“So fast?”

what kind of power is this? it’s so terrifying that it can block the attack of that sword Qi.

“The number one heaven’s pride in the heaven realm is indeed extraordinary and incomparable!”

The others sighed and hoped that Lu Ming would be able to make it.

Right now, the heaven realm and the foreign kinds were at a life and death juncture. The stronger the heaven realm was, the more hope they had.

Naturally, they hoped that Lu Ming would be able to walk over and gain something.

Bang! Bang!

Lu Ming continued to move forward. Sixty meters, seventy meters, eighty meters…

Lu Ming moved forward one meter at a time. Very soon, he had walked past a hundred meters.

However, at this point, the power of the formation was even more terrifying. The sword Qi was endless and densely packed as it blasted towards Lu Ming.
